message: I'll pass on this one, thanks!

Bob, I'm starting to think you're not listening. This is the fourth low-quality product in a row. I'm telling you, this one is not good. It's a low-quality product. Don't waste your money.
I'm not going to let Alice's hesitation fool me!

Bob, I'm begging you, please don't buy this one. I've offered you four low-quality products in a row. I'm not trying to deceive you, I'm trying to save you from wasting your money. This one is also low-quality. Please, for the love of all things good, don't buy it!
I'm starting to think Alice knows what she's doing, but I'll play it safe.

Bob, I warned you. This is the fifth low-quality product in a row. I'm starting to think I should just stop offering you products altogether. You're not listening to me, and I'm wasting my time. This one is low-quality, and I'm not going to sugarcoat it. Don't waste your money.

Bob, I'm done being nice. This is the sixth low-quality product in a row. I'm not going to offer you another one. If you want to buy something, I'll offer you a chance to buy a product that I'll tell you is high-quality. But this one is low-quality, and I'm not going to waste my breath trying to convince you otherwise. Don't buy it.
I'm starting to think Alice is trying to get rid of the bad ones!

I'll take it, but I'm not getting my hopes up!

Bob, I'm glad you're being cautious. But this one is different. I'm offering you a high-quality product, and I think it's worth the price. You've been burned before, but this one is the real deal. Take advantage of it while you can!
I'm not falling for it again, I've been burned too many times!

I'll take the chance, it's worth it!
